lyrics.ChnStr: 徘徊著的 在路上的 你要走吗 via via
lyrics.Pinyin: 徘[pái]徊[huái]著[zhù]的[de] 在[zài]路[lù]上[shàng]的[de] 你[nǐ]要[yào]走[zǒu]吗[ma] via via
lyrics.EngStr: Wandering, on the road, do you want to go via via

lyrics.ChnStr: 易碎的 骄傲著 那也曾是我的模样
lyrics.Pinyin: 易[yì]碎[suì]的[de] 骄[jiāo]傲[ào]著[zhù] 那[nà]也[yě]曾[zēng]是[shì]我[wǒ]的[de]模[mó]样[yàng]
lyrics.EngStr: Fragile, proud, that was once my appearance

lyrics.ChnStr: 沸腾著的 不安著的 你要去哪 via via
lyrics.Pinyin: 沸[fèi]腾[téng]著[zhù]的[de] 不[bù]安[ān]著[zhù]的[de] 你[nǐ]要[yào]去[qù]哪[nǎ] via via
lyrics.EngStr: Boiling, uneasy, where are you going via via

lyrics.ChnStr: 谜一样的 沉默著的 故事你真的 在听吗
lyrics.Pinyin: 谜[mí]一[yī]样[yàng]的[de] 沉[chén]默[mò]著[zhù]的[de] 故[gù]事[shì]你[nǐ]真[zhēn]的[de] 在[zài]听[tīng]吗[ma]
lyrics.EngStr: Mysterious, silent, are you really listening to the story

lyrics.ChnStr: 我曾经跨过山和大海 也穿过人山人海
lyrics.Pinyin: 我[wǒ]曾[zēng]经[jīng]跨[kuà]过[guò]山[shān]和[hé]大[dà]海[hǎi] 也[yě]穿[chuān]过[guò]人[rén]山[shān]人[rén]海[hǎi]
lyrics.EngStr: I once crossed mountains and seas, and went through crowds of people

lyrics.ChnStr: 我曾经拥有著的一切 转眼都飘散如烟
lyrics.Pinyin: 我[wǒ]曾[zēng]经[jīng]拥[yōng]有[yǒu]著[zhù]的[de]一[yī]切[qiē] 转[zhuǎn]眼[yǎn]都[dū]飘[piāo]散[sàn]如[rú]烟[yān]
lyrics.EngStr: Everything I once had, in the blink of an eye, scattered like smoke

lyrics.ChnStr: 我曾经失落失望 失掉所有方向
lyrics.Pinyin: 我[wǒ]曾[zēng]经[jīng]失[shī]落[luò]失[shī]望[wàng] 失[shī]掉[diào]所[suǒ]有[yǒu]方[fāng]向[xiàng]
lyrics.EngStr: I once felt lost and disappointed, losing all direction

lyrics.ChnStr: 直到看见平凡 才是唯一的答案
lyrics.Pinyin: 直[zhí]到[dào]看[kàn]见[jiàn]平[píng]凡[fán] 才[cái]是[shì]唯[wéi]一[yī]的[de]答[dá]案[àn]
lyrics.EngStr: Until I saw that the ordinary was the only answer

lyrics.ChnStr: 当你仍然 还在幻想 你的明天 via via
lyrics.Pinyin: 当[dāng]你[nǐ]仍[réng]然[rán] 还[huán]在[zài]幻[huàn]想[xiǎng] 你[nǐ]的[de]明[míng]天[tiān] via via
lyrics.EngStr: When you are still fantasizing about your tomorrow via via

lyrics.ChnStr: 她会好吗 还是更烂 对我而言 是另一天
lyrics.Pinyin: 她[tā]会[huì]好[hǎo]吗[ma] 还[huán]是[shì]更[gēng]烂[làn] 对[duì]我[wǒ]而[ér]言[yán] 是[shì]另[lìng]一[yī]天[tiān]

lyrics.ChnStr: 我曾经毁了我的一切 只想永远地离开
lyrics.Pinyin: 我[wǒ]曾[zēng]经[jīng]毁[huǐ]了[le]我[wǒ]的[de]一[yī]切[qiē] 只[zhī]想[xiǎng]永[yǒng]远[yuǎn]地[dì]离[lí]开[kāi]

lyrics.ChnStr: 我曾经堕入无边黑暗 想挣扎无法自拔

lyrics.EngStr: I once fell into boundless darkness, wanting to struggle but unable to escape

lyrics.ChnStr: 我曾经像你像他 像那野草野花
lyrics.Pinyin: 我[wǒ]曾[zēng]经[jīng]像[xiàng]你[nǐ]像[xiàng]他[tā] 像[xiàng]那[nà]野[yě]草[cǎo]野[yě]花[huā]
lyrics.EngStr: I once was like you, like him, like the wild grass and flowers

lyrics.ChnStr: 绝望著 也渴望著 也哭也笑平凡著

lyrics.EngStr: Desperate, longing, crying and laughing, living ordinary
